name: Cave Explorer (League0fGaming)
description:
Move with WASD or arrow keys. Point and click to shoot. Escape to pause.

Explore procedurally-generated caves and find the exit to the next one. Each cave you explore will give you one point. See how far you can go!

New modes and other features may be added in the future, such as: different themed cave/character models, new modes (like timed caves, limited ammo, or pure dark), different weapons, different enemies, and more!
